column4: Our Kids' shoe range never stops evolving. These are the latest additions to the collection. Fusing iconic silhouettes with trend-inspired details and air-cushioned comfort, our Kids' shoes aims to empower the next generation of rebellious thinkers.

column3: Women's Boots, Shoes & Sandals | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Drawing on decades of alternative heritage, Dr. Martens women's collection provides the comfort, durability and attitude synonymous with our brand. With a diverse range of original Dr. Martens shoes, combined with bold new designs, our mix of women's boots, shoes and accessories is all you need to empower your self-expression.

column3: Men's Chelsea Boots | Men's Boots | Dr. Martens Official
column4: The Chelsea boot dates back to the Victorian era. But it wasn't until the 1970s that it was given a rugged DMs overhaul. In the decades since, we've produced a diverse range of men's Chelsea boots, from trend-inspired contemporary takes to our Original 2976 in Smooth leather.

column3: Men's Ankle Boots | Men's Boots | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Styles with an instantly recognizable Dr. Martens silhoutte. Made for the self-expressive individual. Shop men's ankle boots that are modern, comfortable, and iconic.

column3: Women's Heels | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Heels, the DMs way. Our range of heeled boots and shoes are designed with AirWar soles and built with our renowned durability. Shop our collection of women's heels below.

column3: Women's Mary Janes | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Our 8065 Mary Jane shoes subvert the tradition of impractical women's footwear. Made from tough DM's leathers and sat on our renowned AirWair sole, they're built with Docs-level durability and a hardy Goodyear welt. Here you'll find a range of designs for adults and children, including our Original 8065 in Smooth leather.

column3: Kids' Best Sellers | Kids | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Shop a range of our bestselling children's boots, shoes and sandals: a collection of popular styles for rebellious little feet. Inspired by some of our most recognizable designs including the 1460 and the 1461, this is where you'll find their first pair.

column3: Made in England | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Crafted using original techniques, our Made in England range includes some of our most iconic pieces handcrafted in our original Wollaston factory. Manufactured in Northamptonshire by experienced factory cobblers, our Made in England collection features Originals such as the 1460 and 1461 shoe.

column4: Dr. Martens accessories range from bags to clothing to shoe care. All manufactured with Docs-level durability, or designed to enhance it, in the case of shoe care. Shop our collection of accessories below.

column3: Women's Bags & Backpacks | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Authentic Dr. Martens durability, in the form of fashionable women's bags and backpacks. Because if you're going to carry your life around in a bag, it should be one that'll last.

column3: Laces | Shoe Care | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Customize your DMs with our collection of shoe laces. Striped or silky to round or flat, make sure you lace up the Docs way. Shop our shoe laces below.

column3: Shoe Care | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Docs shoes stand the test of time. They age with you, stand tough with you, and Dr. Martens shoe care and shoe accessories range keep them tougher than ever. These shoe cleaners, polishes and balsams will see you through every scuff, kick and stage-dive, while our diverse mix of laces allows you to personalize and maximize your individual style.

column3: Socks | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Every pair of Doc’s needs a standout pair of socks. In this collection, you’ll find a bold range of printed socks as well as our renowned ‘Doc Socks’ — specially engineered to provide extra padding and slip resistance.

column3: Men's Accessories | Accessories | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Dr. Martens men's accessories range from robust leather bags to warm wool scarves, all manufactured with our renowned durability. Use them for practicality and to add some attitude to your look.

column4: Dr. Martens bags are built like our shoes: tough. Our collection of men's bags includes backpacks, satchels and messenger bags, all designed to amplify your individual style. With leather bags as well as vegan bags, they're manufactured to provide maximum functionality and comfort.

column3: Original Boots & Shoes | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Designed for industry. Championed through music. Our Originals were first built decades ago and have become iconic through our many wearers. Renowned for their durability, the collection includes men's boots, shoes and loafers which stay true to our heritage and DNA.

column3: Original Leather and Vegan Boots | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Designed for industry. Championed through music. Our Originals were first built decades ago and have become iconic through our many wearers. Renowned for their durability, the collection includes boots and shoes that stay true to our core heritage and DNA.

column3: 1460 Boots | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Our most famous and instantly recognizable silhouette, the 1460 is the Original Dr. Martens boot. First created in 1960, and made iconic by our wearers in the decades since: the 1460 lace up boot is built to last. Our collection now includes a variety of bold designs, colors and textures.

column3: 1490 (10 Eye Boots) | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Over time our boots have become icons, recognized around the world for their distinct silhouettes and air-cushioned comfort. Our range of 10-eye 1490 mid-calf, lace up boots are no different. Available in the iconic Dr. Martens originals Smooth leather, the collection is ever-evolving and continues to stay true to our heritage.

column3: 2976 Chelsea Boots | Dr. Martens Official
column4: The Chelsea boot dates all the way back to the Victorian era. But it wasn't until the 1970s that it was given a rugged DMs overhaul. The 2976 is our tough take on the Chelsea boot. Built with elasticated side panels, a robust air-cushioned sole and all our core DNA. The unisex boot comes in a variety of bold colors and textures: from our OriginalsSmooth leather to contemporary designs.  (View more)

column3: 101 (6 Eye Boots) | Dr. Martens Official
column4: The 101 is an instantly recognizable Dr. Martens ankle boot that packs all our DNA into a sleek, 6-eye silhouette. Available in both Brando and Smooth leather, our 101 leather boots are crafted with a Goodyear-welted construction and sit on our renowned AirWair soles.

column3: 1914 (14 Eye Boots) | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Over time our boots have become icons, recognized around the world for their distinct silhouettes and air-cushioned comfort. Our range of towering, 14-eye 1914 lace up boots are no different. Available in the iconic Dr. Martens Originals Smooth leather, the collection is ever-evolving and continues to stay true to our heritage. Shop our range of 1914 boots below.  (View more)

column3: Church Monkey Boots | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Inspired by an old design taken from the DMs vault, our collection of Church monkey boots are built from a traditional biscuit-backed leather and color-matched to our original archive samples. The yellow stitching, AirWair heel loop and air-cushioned sole mark them as Dr. Martens.

column3: Original Shoes & Boots | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Designed for industry. Championed through music. Our Originals shoes were first built decades ago and have become iconic through our many wearers. Renowned for their durability, the collection includes men's shoes which stay true to our core heritage and DNA.

column3: 1461 Shoes | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Our Original 1461 shoe, was the second style we ever produced, way back in 1961. These days the 1461 Oxford shoe collection includes a variety of vegan and leather designs, such as the 1461 Smooth and 1461 Mono, all built to empower your individual style while offering air-cushioned comfort.

column3: 3989 Brogue Shoes | Dr. Martens Official
column4: In the 1960s, the 3989 broke the mold for a British brogue shoe. Unisex and robust, on a rugged AirWair sole, it's a brogue made the Dr. Martens way. The collection now includes a variety of brogue dress shoes, including leather and vegan alternatives, as well as pairs manufactured at our original Cobbs Lane factory in England.

column3: 8065 Mary Jane | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Our 8065 Mary Jane shoes subvert the tradition of impractical women's shoes. Made from tough DMs leathers and built on our renowned AirWair sole, they're built with Docs-level durability and a hardy Goodyear welt. Here you'll find a range of designs for adults and children, including our Original 8065 in Smooth leather.

column3: 8053 (5 Eye Shoes) | Dr. Martens Official
column4: The 8053 is one of our Original designs: a toned-down casual shoe with 5 eyelets, welt stitching and a rugged AirWair sole.

column3: Adrian Tassel Loafers | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Inspired by the subcultures that adopted us, the Adrian tassel loafer rolled off the production line in the 1970s — fusing Mod-like smartness with DMs-level durability. These days our range of Adrian tassel loafers includes a variety of leathers and vegan alternatives while staying true to the iconic silhouette.

column3: Polley T-Bar | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Grunge gigs. Paris runways. Harajuku streets. Polley is the tough-as-nails Mary Jane shoe that took us around the world. The buckle shoe was one of the first we produced for women, and the attitude and empowering silhouette lives on to this day.

column3: Women's Originals Boots & Shoes | Original Boots & Shoes | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Crafted for industry, made rebellious by generations of non-conformists. Our Original icons are instantly recognizable. And the only difference here? A narrower cut for women.

column4: The toughest jobs require the toughest footwear-and Dr. Martens is prepared. Our range of heavy duty work boots provides comfort and protection for all day work wear. They're ready for anything the day can throw at them.

Extra Wide Work Boots | Work Boots & Shoes | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Designed to make the work day more comfortable. Dr. Martens offers industry-ready boots and shoes in a wide, comfort fit to accommodate a range of sizes.

column3: Steel Toe Work Boots & Shoes | Work Boots & Shoes | Dr. Martens Official
column4: With the comfort and attitude of an Original Dr. Martens boot, our range of steel toe shoes will ensure that you stay safe and comfortable in the workplace. In this range, you'll find a variety of designs for any work environment, from steel toe-capped safety boots to a pair of pull-on work shoes.

column3: Women's Work Boots & Shoes | Dr. Martens Official
column4: A collection of iconic styles combined with durability and comfort that workers can trust: our range of women's work boots and shoes will ensure your feet are protected throughout the day. Designed with a variety of reliable safety features, these boots are built to stand up to the most demanding work environments.

column3: Work Boots & Shoes | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Dr. Martens shoes have been the choice of workers since 1960. Our collection of work and safety boots are engineered for the most demanding work environments and include a diverse range of designs.

column3: Work Boots & Shoes | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Dr. Martens shoes have been the choice of workers since 1960. Our collection of work and safety boots are engineered for the most demanding work environments and include a diverse range of designs.

column3: Anti-Static Work Boots | Work Boots & Shoes | Dr. Martens Official
column4: The Original Dr. Martens boot was created for factory workers and postmen. For six decades on our Work range has honored that heritage. Our range of anti-static shoes provides durability and support in a wide range of lightweight and steel toe designs.

column3: Electrical Hazard Work Boots | Work Boots & Shoes | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Since 1960, workers have chosen Dr. Martens for safe, comfortable work boots and shoes. Our electrical hazard styles are industry-ready, with additional insulation to help protect the wearer against accidental contact with an electrical charge.

column3: Heat Resistant Safety Boots | Work Boots & Shoes | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Dr. Martens has been the choice of workers for six decades. Our heat resistant work boots can protect you in even the most demanding environments.

column3: Metatarsal Guard Work Boots | Work Boots & Shoes | Dr. Martens Official
column4: These Dr. Martens are built for industry. Our toughest styles offer protection in the most demanding of workplaces. By including a rigid steel metatarsal guard, we've made the ultimate work boot.

column3: Slip Resistant Work Boots | Work Boots & Shoes | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Stay grounded with our slip-resistant boots and shoes. Durable and practical with the same Docs attitude, our slip-resistant shoes is designed to keep the pace with you through work, downtime and everything in between.

column3: Steel Toe Work Boots & Shoes | Work Boots & Shoes | Dr. Martens Official
column4: With the comfort and attitude of an Original Dr. Martens boot, our range of steel toe shoes will ensure that you stay safe and comfortable in the workplace. In this range, you'll find a variety of designs for any work environment, from steel toe-capped safety boots to a pair of pull-on work shoes.

column3: Waterproof Work Boots | Work Boots & Shoes | Dr. Martens Official
column4: Since 1960, we've provided workers with comfortable, durable shoes for the most demanding workplaces. Our fully-waterproof work boots offer optimum protection and include designs with additional safety features such as anti-static or slip-resistant soles, puncture-resistant midsoles and safety toecaps.
